thread.title: Doctors Without Borders: NATO Statements 'Admission Of A War Crime'
thread.title_full: Doctors Without Borders: NATO Statements 'Admission Of A War Crime'

author: Susie Madrak
title: Doctors Without Borders: NATO Statements 'Admission Of A War Crime'
text:
sharethis 10/05/15 10:00am The Afghan government's own statements following the Saturday airstrikes in Kunduz, northern Afghanistan, that killed at least 22 people were the "admission of a war crime," the charity organization Doctors Without Borders said Monday. The Afghan statements were released in order to justify the attacks, which were carried out by U.S.-led NATO forces and later forcedâ€¦ Afghanistan , Airstrikes , Doctors Without Borders , Kunduz Comments
